com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartsync.accounts

Class SmartSyncUserAccountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.accounts.UserAccountManager
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.smartsync.accounts.SmartSyncUserAccountManager

  • public class SmartSyncUserAccountManager
extends UserAccountManager
    This class acts as a manager that provides methods to access user accounts that are currently logged in, and can be used to add new user accounts.
    Author:
    bhariharan

      • getInstance

        public static SmartSyncUserAccountManager getInstance()

        Returns:

      • switchToUser

        public void switchToUser(UserAccount user)
        Description copied from class: UserAccountManager
        Switches to the specified user account. If the specified user account is invalid/doesn't exist, this method kicks off the login flow for a new user. When the user account switch is complete, it is imperative for the app to update its cached references to RestClient, to avoid holding on to a RestClient from the previous user.
        Overrides:
        switchToUser in class UserAccountManager
        Parameters:
        user - User account to switch to.

      • switchToNewUser

        public void switchToNewUser()
        Description copied from class: UserAccountManager
        Kicks off the login flow to switch to a new user. Once the login flow is complete, the context will automatically become the new user's context and a call to peekRestClient() or getRestClient() in ClientManager will return a RestClient instance for the new user.
        Overrides:
        switchToNewUser in class UserAccountManager

      • switchToNewUser

        public void switchToNewUser(java.lang.String jwt,
                            java.lang.String url)
        Description copied from class: UserAccountManager
        Kicks off the login flow to switch to a new user with jwt. Once the login flow is complete, the context will automatically become the new user's context and a call to peekRestClient() or getRestClient() in ClientManager will return a RestClient instance for the new user.
        Overrides:
        switchToNewUser in class UserAccountManager
        Parameters:
        jwt - JWT.
        url - Instance/My domain URL.
